item.description:
Kristen Gadbois at New York Lite Insurance,
Leslie Delanecy, Engel & Voelkers,
and Rain Phillips of The Larches Inn,

Invite you to:

"WOMEN CARE-NECTING"
Special guest and Networking Opportunities

Date: July 17, 2010, Saturday
Where: The Larches Inn
26 South Main Street
Carver, MA 02330
Time: 3-6 pm
Refreshments Will be Served

Special Guest: Birute Regine; EdD, Author, Coach, and Speaker
Will be selling and signing copies of her book

Iron Butterflies "Women Transforming Themselves and the World"

Coaching us (women) in how to "apply feminine skills, and values. Such as:
Inclusion
Empathy
Holistic perspective
Relational Skills
Emotional Strength

No Charge - Just ...bring your wonderful self
We look toward to care-necting with You!
item.name: "WOMEN CARE-NECTING" Special Guests and Networking Opportunities
